DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : COMPANY TOWN ANNEX
DOC.TEXT: Marvel Entertainment President Quits : The company confirmed that Bruce Stein resigned over differences over the company ' s operating and management style.The Wall_Street Journal previously reported that Stein disagreed_with the toy , comic_book and licensing company ' s hiring policies . The Journal said Stein wanted to bring_in his own management team but that those plans were rejected by executives of Toy Biz , one of Marvel ' s licensees . Stein joined Marvel after leaving toy maker Hasbro Inc. in June . Stein had been the head of Hasbro ' s Kenner Products division , which includes Nerf products and Jurassic Park toys . Marvel said Stein ' s duties will be taken_over by Chief_Executive William Bevins Jr .
